name: Meow Meow Mysteries
description:
Percy is a good cat who would never commit a crime. Too bad the same can't be said for her housemates.

Play as Detective Percy and try to figure out which cat was naughty! A short and simple randomly generated logic grid puzzle game :) 

Assets from pipoya, penzilla, raou, cupnooble, datagoblin, tallbeard, ahai64, benjaminno, and ghostpixxells
